languages.text: "Какая жалость, что токи {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}варпа{/g} задержали наш{mf|его|у} защитни{mf|ка|цу} в пути..." {n}В словах губернатора чувствуется едкий намек, но слишком призрачный, чтобы немедленно призвать его к ответу. Судя по неприятной усмешке юного Зауэрбэка, так кажется не только вам.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Какая жалость, что токи варпа задержали наш{mf|его|у} защитницу в пути...". {n}В словах губернатора чувствуется едкий намек, но слишком призрачный, чтобы немедленно призвать его к ответу. Судя по неприятной усмешке юного Зауэрбека, так кажется не только вам.{/n}

languages.text: "Such a terrible shame it is that the {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}warp{/g} currents delayed our protector's arrival..." {n}There is an acidic hint to his words, but it is too faint for you to call him to account. Judging by young Sauerback's unpleasant smile, it is not just your imagination.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Какая жалость, что токи {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}варпа{/g} задержали наш{mf|его|у} защитни{mf|ка|цу} в пути..." {n}В словах губернатора чувствуется едкий намек, но слишком призрачный, чтобы немедленно призвать его к ответу. Судя по неприятной усмешке юного Зауэрбэка, так кажется не только вам.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Such a terrible shame it is that the warp currents delayed our protector's arrival..." {n}There is an acidic hint to his words, but it is too faint for you to call him to account. Judging by young Sauerback's unpleasant smile, it is not just your imagination.{/n}

"Such a terrible shame it is that the warp currents delayed our protector's arrival..." {n}There is an acidic hint to his words, but it is too faint for you to call him to account. Judging by young Sauerback's unpleasant smile, it is not just your imagination.{/n}

"Such a terrible shame it is that the {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}warp{/g} currents delayed our protector's arrival..." {n}There is an acidic hint to his words, but it is too faint for you to call him to account. Judging by young Sauerback's unpleasant smile, it is not just your imagination.{/n}

"Such a terrible shame it is that the {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}warp{/g} currents delayed our protector's arrival..." {n}There is an acidic hint to his words, but it is too faint for you to call him to account. Judging by young Sauerback's unpleasant smile, it is not just your imagination.{/n}

languages.text: 「大変恥ずかしながら、{g|Encyclopedia:Warp}〈歪み〉{/g}の流れにより護民官の到着が遅れているのです…」{n}不穏な気配が総督の言葉に含まれているが、微弱なものなので説明を求められない。ヤング・ザウアーバックが不快な笑みを浮かべていることからも、勘違いではなさそうだ。{/n}
languages.original_text: "Such a terrible shame it is that the {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}warp{/g} currents delayed our protector's arrival..." {n}There is an acidic hint to his words, but it is too faint for you to call him to account. Judging by young Sauerback's unpleasant smile, it is not just your imagination.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「大変恥ずかしながら、{g|Encyclopedia:Warp}〈歪み〉{/g}の流れにより護民官の到着が遅れているのです…」{n}不穏な気配が総督の言葉に含まれているが、微弱なものなので説明を求められない。ヤング・ザウアーバックが不快な笑みを浮かべていることからも、勘違いではなさそうだ。{/n}

languages.text: “{g|Encyclopedia:Warp}亚空间{/g}的湍流没能让我们的保护者及时赶到，这实在是太遗憾了……”{n}他的话语中隐含着讽刺的意味，但实在是太微弱了，你无法就此向他问责。从年轻的苏尔贝克不悦的笑容来看，这并不是你的错觉。{/n}
languages.original_text: "Such a terrible shame it is that the {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}warp{/g} currents delayed our protector's arrival..." {n}There is an acidic hint to his words, but it is too faint for you to call him to account. Judging by young Sauerback's unpleasant smile, it is not just your imagination.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “{g|Encyclopedia:Warp}亚空间{/g}的湍流没能让我们的保护者及时赶到，这实在是太遗憾了……”{n}他的话语中隐含着讽刺的意味，但实在是太微弱了，你无法就此向他问责。从年轻的苏尔贝克不悦的笑容来看，这并不是你的错觉。{/n}

languages.text: «Es toda una tragedia que las corrientes de la {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}disformidad{/g} retrasaran la llegada de nuestr{mf|o|a} protector{mf||a}...». {n}Hay un toque ácido en sus palabras, pero es demasiado tenue como para llamar la atención. Sin embargo, a juzgar por la desagradable sonrisa del joven Sauerback, no son imaginaciones tuyas.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Such a terrible shame it is that the {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}warp{/g} currents delayed our protector's arrival..." {n}There is an acidic hint to his words, but it is too faint for you to call him to account. Judging by young Sauerback's unpleasant smile, it is not just your imagination.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «Es toda una tragedia que las corrientes de la {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}disformidad{/g} retrasaran la llegada de nuestr{mf|o|a} protector{mf||a}...». {n}Hay un toque ácido en sus palabras, pero es demasiado tenue como para llamar la atención. Sin embargo, a juzgar por la desagradable sonrisa del joven Sauerback, no son imaginaciones tuyas.{/n}

languages.text: « Quel dommage que les courants du {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}Warp{/g} aient retardé l'arrivée de notre {mf|protecteur|protectrice}... » {n}Il vous semble déceler une note d'acidité dans ces paroles, mais bien trop anodine pour exiger du gouverneur qu'il vous rende des comptes. Le sourire insolent du jeune Sauerback, en revanche, atteste que ce n'est pas votre imagination qui vous joue des tours.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Such a terrible shame it is that the {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}warp{/g} currents delayed our protector's arrival..." {n}There is an acidic hint to his words, but it is too faint for you to call him to account. Judging by young Sauerback's unpleasant smile, it is not just your imagination.{/n}

traits.locale_text: « Quel dommage que les courants du {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}Warp{/g} aient retardé l'arrivée de notre {mf|protecteur|protectrice}... » {n}Il vous semble déceler une note d'acidité dans ces paroles, mais bien trop anodine pour exiger du gouverneur qu'il vous rende des comptes. Le sourire insolent du jeune Sauerback, en revanche, atteste que ce n'est pas votre imagination qui vous joue des tours.{/n}

languages.text: "Wirklich sehr schade, dass die {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}Warp{/g}-Strömungen die Ankunft {mf|unseres Beschützers|unserer Beschützerin} verzögert haben ..." {n}In seiner Stimme liegt ein säuerlicher Unterton, aber zu versteckt, als dass du ihn darauf ansprechen könntest. Angesichts des unangenehmen Lächelns des jungen Sauerback bildest du dir das aber nicht nur ein.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Such a terrible shame it is that the {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}warp{/g} currents delayed our protector's arrival..." {n}There is an acidic hint to his words, but it is too faint for you to call him to account. Judging by young Sauerback's unpleasant smile, it is not just your imagination.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Wirklich sehr schade, dass die {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}Warp{/g}-Strömungen die Ankunft {mf|unseres Beschützers|unserer Beschützerin} verzögert haben ..." {n}In seiner Stimme liegt ein säuerlicher Unterton, aber zu versteckt, als dass du ihn darauf ansprechen könntest. Angesichts des unangenehmen Lächelns des jungen Sauerback bildest du dir das aber nicht nur ein.{/n}

languages.text: "Koruyucumuzun, {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}öteboyut{/g} akıntıları yüzünden gecikmesi çok yazık oldu..." {n}Sözlerinde hafif bir iğneleme olsa da bu, ondan hesap sorabileceğin kadar bariz değil. Genç Sauerback'in sevimsiz gülümsemesine bakılacak olursa bunun farkında olan bir tek sen değilsin.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Such a terrible shame it is that the {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}warp{/g} currents delayed our protector's arrival..." {n}There is an acidic hint to his words, but it is too faint for you to call him to account. Judging by young Sauerback's unpleasant smile, it is not just your imagination.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Koruyucumuzun, {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}öteboyut{/g} akıntıları yüzünden gecikmesi çok yazık oldu..." {n}Sözlerinde hafif bir iğneleme var ama ondan hesap sorabileceğin kadar bariz değil. Genç Sauerback'in sevimsiz gülümsemesine bakılacak olursa bu durum, sırf senin hayal ettiğin bir şey de değil.{/n}
